strapiPost.title: PACRIDGE Brings Regenerative Farming To Northwest Arkansas
strapiPost.content:
Canadaian-based Pacific Ridge is expanding operations to Northwest Arkansas, intending to bring regenerative soil-to-shelf farming practices to more farmers, retailers, and consumers with transparency and technology. 

  • Sustainability mission: The farmer-owned company and partners with the True Crops farming community to lead transformative environmental & corporate sustainability efforts and supply quality, sustainable plant-based foods, beverages, and ingredients.
  • Branching out: The headquarters of the company's US operations will soon open in Northwest Arkansas at a facility in North Rogers, and plans to hire a group of local talent in sales, marketing, EDI, and logistics to help grow PACRIDGE's influence in the States.

Read more on PACRIDGE's expansion HERE.
